channel.title: Syndromic Surveillance on Baki Cakici

item.title: Detecting the Visible: The Discursive Construction of Health Threats in a Syndromic Surveillance System Design
item.description: Information and communication technologies are not value-neutral tools that reflect reality; they privilege some forms of action, and they limit others.
